column5: DMPI question Should I purchase the rights offering will I still get 250 common shares convertible or it will now be 1000 pref share mkt price is share at the time of purchase say 167 per common share 598 convertible preferred shares per 1000 per pref shareWarrants are give so I didnt factor that in just want to know if Ill get only 250 common shares convertible or 598
